item.title: Kafka: A basic tutorial
item.description: In this post we’re going to learn how to launch Kafka locally and write to and read from a topic using one of the Python drivers. To make things easy for myself, I’ve created a Docker Compose template that launches 3 containers: broker - our Kafka broker zookeeper - used by Kafka for leader election jupyter - notebooks for connecting to our Kafka broker
